summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1251, for the improvement of Thirty-eight Avenue North, from East Prospect Street to East Blaine Street; and East Highland Drive, from Thirty-seventh Avenue North to the east line of Thirty-ninth Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 13715 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
